mapper.select:
select a.cunicode ,a.cgender ,a.cname ,a.cbirth ,a.enter ,a.graduation ,b.classname ,c.username
from tb_child a, tb_class b, tb_parents c where a.classname = b.classname and a.cunicode = c.cunicode
mapper.insert: insert into tb_child (cunicode, classname, cgender, cname, cbirth, enter, graduation) values (#{cunicode}, #{classname}, #{cgender}, #{cname}, #{cbirth}, #{enter}, #{graduation})
